attributes.action: To write in to law, any promises made during a election compain must be honoured
attributes.additional_details: Political parties are far to often making promises and soon as they are in power completely ignoring them
attributes.background: If a political party makes promises and is elected based on said promises, they must adhere to implement the policy or be guilty of fraud and gross misconduct

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
